data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jiang, Guo-Chen, Landeira, José M., Shih, Tung-Wei, Chan, Tin-Yam (2018): First zoeal stage of Plesionika crosnieri Chan & Yu, 1991, P. ortmanni Doflein, 1902, and P. semilaevis Bate, 1888, with remarks on the early larvae of Plesionika Bate, 1888 (Crustacea, Decapoda). Zootaxa 4532 (3): 385-395, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4532.3.4
